article:
:This is harmonized list of population estimates for the year 2000. For a
listing with more recent estimates, see [[List of countries by population]].

 by population for the year 2000 (U.N. source)]]

This is a 'list of countries by population in 2000'. It is a list of countries
in the world by population in the exact beginning of the year 2000.

Because the table contains data only for the 230 nations and territories at the
start of 2000, there are no entries for national regions declared later in 2000
or subsequent years.
